div.div:
Kae - May 9, 2012 - Galaxy Tab 7.0 Plus with version 1.3
Awful
I bought this wallpaper based on the reviews. Not only is the animation really amaturish and stuttery (on a Galaxy Tab Plus, no less), but I apparently can't get a refund as one can with other apps and even wallpapers. I feel thoroughly ripped off by this developer. Be glad you got my dollar; it.s the last one you'll ever get from me.
